website_summaries.verdict: For a soccer cleat that succeeds a classic, the Puma King Top di Firm Ground did not disappoint. It’s iconic black-and-white design and fold-over tongue caught the eye of old-school players. It is innovative, comfortable, and durable enough for goalkeepers, wingers, and defensive-minded players. If you are someone who wants value for your money, then the Puma King Top di Firm Ground might just be the right soccer cleat for you.
pros: Most of the players were impressed by how comfortable this soccer cleat is
This soccer cleat received praises from many reviewers for its durability
Several people liked the stylish all-black design of this soccer cleat
The Puma King Top di Firm Ground offers a nice grip on the ball, as mentioned in some of the reviews
A couple of commenters noticed that this soccer cleat is very easy to clean
There were a few buyers who shared that the Puma King Top di Firm Ground is a bang for your buck
cons: Many users complained that the Puma King Top di Firm Ground is a little tight, especially in the toe area
One individual complained of the damaged stitching at the tip of this soccer cleat

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of Puma Kings which suggests that I like them, which I do. I have always preferred the older style/classic fit of football boots from years gone by as opposed to the lightweight/streamline football boots used nowadays. They aren't the lightest but perform admirably on grass pitches and easily see out a season of steady football. My only problem is I always use an ankle brace when playing and in doing so has damaged the inside of the boot lining, but that is too be expected as they are not designed with wearing an ankle brace in mind. Would recommend for those who prefer a classic fit football boot.
customer_reviews.author: Christie365

customer_reviews.title: Not genuine
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived and the sole stuck out past the toe end of the boots so there was a “lip” which when in use is easy to catch on the floor and cause the the boots to disintegrate. Not sure if they are genuine as not the best quality. Returned and did not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: michy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product - but consider going up half a size if you're in any doubt
customer_reviews.text: A hard wearing pair of boots, yet I've found them a to be a little tight. New boots always are but they haven't given as I expected them to. May be worth going up half a size to be sure. Design and manufacture wise I can't fault them otherwise. They've had some hard use, but clean up well (no irritating mud in the stitching), and the stitching is still intact. A good purchase, shame they haven't given and rub on the heel. Were this not the case, definitely a 5* purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome_Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3g or 4g pitches. Not sure about the manufacture quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got these to play on 3g astro after using astro studded trainers for 6 months. Kept twisting my knee in the trainers and would be sore all week but after just 2 weeks wearing these the knee is fine so think they definitely grip better. Classic boot, comfy and very good grip, would definitely recommend for 3g or 4g pitches. UPDATE After 12 months of once weekly use all the sole has ripped away from the leather on one of the boots. Very disappointed, expected them to last a lot longer than a year for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Classic boot
customer_reviews.text: Great value lot cheaper then the shops. Classic boot very comfortable and nice wide fitting.
customer_reviews.author: sean c

customer_reviews.title: Big boys boots
customer_reviews.text: Maradona and Pele wore these boots.. Good enough for the greatest... Good enough for me..
customer_reviews.author: Caomhin

customer_reviews.title: Classic comfort
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion the Puma King originals are one of the best boots ever! My only gripe if you can call it that is that I always have to buy a size larger with Puma but a decent insole soon sorts out the problem of my left foot being smaller than my right! The soft leather upper moulds to your feet almost immediately! I won't buy any other boot!
customer_reviews.author: ian christie

customer_reviews.title: Ordered firn ground and recieved soft ground
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as they were a bargain and i go through at least 2 pairs a year. Just opened (yes 6months later) as my last pair are now done and they are studs and not FG. Disappointed so now will need to go buy another pair. My fault for not checking when delivered but disappointed in championship week
customer_reviews.author: Ek

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for a reasonable price, careful on 4g mind.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift.
customer_reviews.text: The user is so happy with them. I am not an expert.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Split after 6 games.
customer_reviews.text: Brought a pair of these boots in September for the start of the football session, 6 games my son has worn them for and they have come away at the front and splitting at sides, not impressed with these at all.
customer_reviews.author: helen draper

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased about how it got along. Received two pairs of shoes in the expected quality for an adequate price. If required I would order there again,
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Borromäus

customer_reviews.title: I always buy Puma King as they fit me perfectly, are very comfortable and are top quality.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Puma King as they are a top quality boot and well worth the money. However, personally I would suggest buying half a size bigger than you normally wear for the very best fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the boots was as expected but I ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the boots was as expected but I would probably suggest that other intended purchasers request a half-size up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, made to last
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality boot, the leather is soft and flexible but holds my foot securely. It's an iconic brand and boot and totally meets expectations. Beware of glitzy imitators making expensive and false claims, these are the real McCoy.
customer_reviews.author: John Bidwell

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable out the box
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfortable out the box. Have had a good 6-7 hours use out of them so far and stitching and quality still intact very good build.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, battered box
customer_reviews.text: The actual football boot it’s self is fine but the box has come smashed! For £95 and a Christmas present this is not good enough! There is no delivery note or anything Really not happy
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet - but excellent boot.
customer_reviews.text: My last pair were Puma Esito(?) They were a broader fit and comfortable so I went for the same size. The Puma Kings However are narrower and with the elastic inner feel quite tight. Worn once, scored 4 so I’m not complaining!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Used to play in Puma King some 15 years ago when I was playing. Now refereeing and have used various makes over the past few tears, but decided to spend a little bit and try puma king. Well worth it. Excellent boot and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: wozzer

customer_reviews.title: Vets football
customer_reviews.text: Decent boots. I vary between size 9 & 10 and 9.5 fitted well
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: I fit 9 / 10 - 10's fit best with these boots - good for the wider foot
customer_reviews.text: I fit 9 / 10 - 10's fit best with these boots - good for the wider foot .
customer_reviews.author: yobster

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Present for hubby and he loves them. Great fit, the style is exactly what he wanted (and he is a fussy so-and-so)!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirls

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!! B
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the bollocks!! Proper old school Don't go for the cheaper version, they aren't the real deal!! Very pleased!! B.....E....A..Utiful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: My son's has always wore these boots. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic boots! So comfy and great to play in. Wouldn't get any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and perfect for playing in. And a bargain for under £30
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolute bargain old skool boots so comfy would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Mr Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Best moulded boot on the market
customer_reviews.text: Always worn Puma King moulded, not let down at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boots in the world
customer_reviews.text: The king of football boots. Leather so soft and comfy
customer_reviews.author: duane Jackson

customer_reviews.title: As expecred but unbranded packaging
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Came in unbranded box or packaging but seems genuine and quality
customer_reviews.author: David Payne

customer_reviews.title: Old classics
customer_reviews.text: Still as good as they were 15 years ago when I had my first pair
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hammersley

customer_reviews.title: Ten years of Puma
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than Puma King Classics, the sole delaminated prior to their useful life. Possibly from extreme Arizona heat. I will treat new pair accordingly, if same results I will have to end my ten year support of the Puma firm ground boot.
customer_reviews.author: truckerdrf

customer_reviews.title: Complaint
customer_reviews.text: Had to send them back twice and the inners came away after wearing once
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant price,as always expected great boot,amazon fantastic communication and delivery,very pleased I bought from yourselves
customer_reviews.author: Damien Campbell

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I bout it for my boyfriend. He like them verry much. They are very comfortable he said. Vry easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: juvi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very quickly delivered. Boots fit as expected and hard wearing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots arrived promptly and I was very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran

customer_reviews.title: Only played once so far, but was very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: You need to order an 1/2 size up ( I am a 10 and got a 10.5 ), I have a wide foot and these were perfect and fitted very well, very soft. You would not know they were a new boot to break in, unlike my Adidas boots that i had - Adipure 11 pro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good boots, too small.
customer_reviews.text: Top quality, well made football boots, for sure, but the size 12s I purchased weren't even close to being size 12, which makes them unfit for their intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Puma King Top di Firm Ground Men's Football Competition Shoes
product_meta.description: Professional football shoe for use hard natural surfaces. The thin and lightweight leather offers the player maximum comfort and ball control.Reinforced stitching at upper improves cleats longevity.
feature_bullets: PUMA Lite leather for comfort and durability.
GripTex ankle lining helps keep blisters at bay.
